options.name: class
options.description: Enter the class code for the class you'd like to join. For multiple, separate them with a comma.

options.name: class
options.description: Enter the class code for the class you'd like to leave

options.name: create
options.description: Create a channel & role for a class not yet on the server. This is a moderator-only command.

options.name: class
options.description: Enter the class code for the class you'd like to create

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete the channel & role for a class on the server. This is a moderator-only command.

options.name: class
options.description: Enter the class code for the class you'd like to delete
